item.title: Jennifer add a quote by Wendell Berry
item.description: "Rats and roaches live by competition under the laws of supply and demand; it is the privilege of human beings to live under the laws of justice and mercy." -- Wendell Berry

item.title: Jennifer add a quote by Benjamin Franklin
item.description: "Believe none of what you hear, and only half of what you see." -- Benjamin Franklin

item.title: Jennifer add a quote by Laurel Thatcher Ulrich
item.description: "Well-behaved women seldom make history." -- Laurel Thatcher Ulrich

item.title: Jennifer add a quote by Neil deGrasse Tyson
item.description: "For me, I am driven by two main philosophies: know more today about the world than I knew yesterday and lessen the suffering of others. You'd be surprised how far that gets you." -- Neil deGrasse Tyson

item.title: Jennifer add a quote by Veronica Roth
item.description: "My father used to say that sometimes, the best way to help someone is just to be near them. I feel good when I do something I know he would be proud of, like it makes up for all the things I’ve done that he wouldn’t be proud of." -- Veronica Roth

item.title: Jennifer add a quote by Baba Dioum
item.description: "In the end we will conserve only what we love; we will love only what we understand; and we will understand only what we have been taught." -- Baba Dioum

item.title: Jennifer add a quote by J.D. Horn
item.description: "You don’t reason with a lightning bolt or negotiate with a hurricane," -- J.D. Horn

item.title: Jennifer add a quote by James Maxwell
item.description: "Anyone who thinks the sky is the limit, has limited imagination." -- James Maxwell

item.title: Jennifer add a quote by Phyllis T. Smith
item.description: "My knees ache when I walk, but if I sit still, I do not feel so different from the girl I was." -- Phyllis T. Smith

item.title: Jennifer add a quote by - David G. Kelly
item.description:
"A gentle word like a spark of light, Illuminates my soul And as each sound goes deeper, It's YOU that makes me whole
There is no corner, no dark place, YOUR LOVE cannot fill And if the world starts causing waves, It's your devotion that makes them still
And yes you always speak to me, In sweet honesty and truth Your caring heart keeps out the rain, YOUR LOVE, the ultimate roof
So thank you my Love for being there, For supporting me, my life I'll do the same for you, you know, My Beautiful, Darling Wife." -- - David G. Kelly
